Welcome to OC-Lettings’s documentation!

Web App Orange County Lettings

This project is carried out as part of the Application Developer training - Python taught by OpenClassrooms.

It’s about minimizing the technical debt of the existing web app, Orange County Lettings, and deploying it via a CircleCi pipeline according to a process defined in the specifications.
